issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

If I have a search bar in the Nav Bar with a back button on the left-hand side, then I switch tabs, then come back to my tab/window with the search bar, the search bar has moved to the left and the back button on the left-hand side is gone.

{html}
fields.summary: Search Bar moves to left on tab change

comments.body:
{html}

This was fixed in 0.8 I believe, and is very moot and fixed with 1.x.

{html}
